# Curse Water (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, M (5 lbs. of powdered silver worth 25 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Flask of water touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (object)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (object)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 263

This spell imbues a flask (1 pint) of water with negative energy, turning it into unholy water. Unholy water damages good outsiders the way holy water damages undead and evil outsiders.
